title: Epik High Collection - More (Korean Hip-Hop)
description:
This collection of Epik High albums contains the following:

Map of the Human Soul, their 2003 debut (128 kbps)
High Society, their second album (192 kbps)
LoveScream, a 2008 EP (320 kbps)
Mapping the Human Soul, 2009 (192 kbps)

Yes, I know High Society is already in my other Epik High Upload but this one is slightly higher quality.

Also, Mapping the Human Soul is part of a Book-Album set.  I haven't seen the book by that title but I do have a book by Tablo called Pieces of You which was originally published in English then translated into Korean (and seriously enhanced with photos, etc)...  I'll see what I can do about sharing that in the future, too!
